messages.body: Hi, I noticed an unauthorized charge on my credit card from your platform. I don't recognize this purchase and haven't made any recent transactions. Could you help me investigate this and process a refund? Please respond to my email with details.

Hello Rebecca,

I understand your concern about the unauthorized charge. To help investigate this matter, could you please provide:

1. The last 4 digits of your credit card
2. The date of the charge
3. The exact amount charged
4. Your billing address

This information will help us locate the transaction and verify its authenticity. Once we have these details, we can investigate further and process a refund if the charge is indeed unauthorized.

Rest assured that we take payment security very seriously and will help resolve this issue promptly.

Best regards,
Alex
